content:
ITask ITask Interface

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client
Assembly:
Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client.dll

Describes a task within a job in the system.

Edit

GetClearConfiguration() GetClearConfiguration()

Edit

Gets the decrypted configuration data.

string GetClearConfiguration()Function GetClearConfiguration As String
Returns
String String

A string containing the configuration data. If the data was encrypted, the configuration returned is decrypted.
